plist.dict:
NSContactsUsageDescription <<<<<<< HEAD Sellout need to access your Contacts to share your friends with you NSCameraUsageDescription Sellout need to access your Camera to take a photo of your product NSMicrophoneUsageDescription Sellout need to access your Microphone to record your voice NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription Sellout need to access your Photo Library to upload your product photo ======= Sellout uses your contacts to help you invite friends to the marketplace and find people you know who are already using the app NSCameraUsageDescription Sellout uses your camera to take photos of marketplace products, capture profile pictures, and share images in chat conversations NSMicrophoneUsageDescription Sellout uses your microphone to record voice messages in chat conversations, audio notes for marketplace listings, and voice reviews for products and services NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription Sellout accesses your photo library to upload marketplace product images, select profile pictures, and share photos in chat conversations >>>>>>> e947def20999a92448313553bb695b63691bc934 NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription This app saves photos to your gallery. NSAppTransportSecurity
NSAllowsArbitraryLoads
UIApplicationSceneManifest
UIApplicationSupportsMultipleScenes
LSApplicationQueriesSchemes
stripe sms tel
CADisableMinimumFrameDurationOnPhone
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE) CFBundleDisplayName Sellout CFBundleExecutable $(EXECUTABLE_NAME) CFBundleIdentifier $(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER) CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleLocalizations
en
CFBundleName sellout CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleShortVersionString $(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME) CFBundleSignature ???? CFBundleURLTypes
CFBundleTypeRole Editor CFBundleURLSchemes
selloutweb.com
CFBundleVersion $(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER) LSRequiresIPhoneOS
NSAppleMusicUsageDescription <<<<<<< HEAD Sellout need to access your Apple Music to play/share your favorite music NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription Sellout need to access your Location to improve your user experience NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription Sellout need to access your Location to improve your user experience ======= Sellout integrates with Apple Music to let you share your favorite songs with friends in chat conversations and showcase music preferences on your profile NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription Sellout uses your location to show nearby marketplace listings, provide local pickup options, and help you find services in your area NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription Sellout uses your location to show nearby marketplace listings, provide local pickup options, and help you find services in your area >>>>>>> e947def20999a92448313553bb695b63691bc934 PHPhotoLibraryPreventAutomaticLimitedAccessAlert

remote-notification
